name: SprinklConserve
0:
”Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve how much rain we had today”
”Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve when my sprinklers can run next”
”Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve to change watering mode”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sprinkl conserve
des:
This is the companion Alexa skill for the Sprinkl Conserve device. In order to use this skill you must have a Sprinkl user account and a Sprinkl Conserve device. 

Use Alexa to quickly change the watering mode and get the status of your Sprinkl Conserve connected smart sensor.

To find out if your system is allowed to water today, use the phrase:
Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve if my sprinklers can water today.

To change the watering mode of the device, use the phrase:
Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve to change watering mode.

To hear system status information, including watering shut off reasons, use the phrase:
Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve what the status is.

To find what the system recorded rainfall for today is, use one of the following phrases:
Alexa, ask Sprinkl Conserve how much rain we had today.
